var responseBody = pm.response.json();
var token = responseBody.data.token; // Adjust this according to your response structure
// Set the token as the collection-level variable

request.description: List all members (referrals) in the vendor's network across all 3 levels
Get hierarchical referral tree showing level 1, 2, and 3 members

item.name: Vendor Successors

request.description:
Add or update a successor profile for the vendor (in case of disability or death).

**IMPORTANT:** This endpoint uses an upsert pattern - if a successor already exists for the vendor, it will be updated instead of creating a duplicate record.

**Request Fields:**
- name (required): Successor's full name
- nationality (optional): Successor's nationality
- phone (required): Contact phone number
- proof_type (required): passport or personal_id
- proof_id (required): ID number from the proof document
- kinship (required): son, brother, father, daughter, sister, mother, spouse, or other
- avatar (optional): Avatar image URL or path

item.description: Vendor successor management endpoints. The POST endpoint uses an upsert pattern - it will update an existing successor if one exists for the vendor, preventing duplicate records.
